Pictures from Inner Mongolia

Published

2008-07-23

I don't have much time to write about the experience, so I'm just putting up some pictures. The trip wasn't ideal, but overall it was a positive experience, and it left me with some pretty cool pictures.

First, a video of me trying to slide down a sand dune and failing miserably.

 

And click below to see lots of pictures from the whole trip. Click on any picture in the slideshow to see the high-resolution version.
